title: Memecoin donations pour in for BlackRock $100 million token fund partnered with Coinbase
description:
Asset management firm BlackRock selected Coinbase as the key infrastructure provider for its tokenized investment fund, BlackRock USD Institutional Digital Liquidity Fund (BUIDL). According to BlackRock: “BUIDL seeks to offer a stable value of $1 per token and pays daily accrued dividends directly to investors’ wallets as new tokens each month. The Fund invests 100% […]

The post Memecoin donations pour in for BlackRock $100 million token fund partnered with Coinbase appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Avalanche to Launch Web3 Voucher Program on Alipay
description: The smart contracts platform Avalanche recently said it is collaborating with the Chinese payments giant Alipay to launch a Web3-enabled voucher program. The second phase will see the proof of concept being expanded to more than 100 million users from Southeast Asian countries. Web3-Enabled Vouchers Avalanche, a smart contracts platform, has said it is working […]

title: zkPass Joins BNB Chain Airdrop Alliance, Commits to Rewarding Network Contributors
description: New York, United States, March 21st, 2024, Chainwire zkPass, announced its participation in the BNB Chain Airdrop Alliance Program. This strategic collaboration underlines a profound commitment to the community, emphasizing the vital importance of rewarding user engagement and loyalty. Through this initiative, a total of 4 million zkPass tokens are poised for distribution to both […]

title: Coin base’s CLO Paul Grewal Stands Firm in Ethereum’s Defense Against SEC
description: Amid escalating regulatory scrutiny surrounding Ethereum (ETH), Paul Grewal, Chief Legal Officer (CLO) at Coinbase, has stepped forward to counter misinformation and defend the cryptocurrency’s status within the broader crypto landscape.  Grewal’s assertions come in response to reports suggesting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is pushing to classify Ethereum as a security, sparking […]

title: Huge Developments; Blackrock launches BUILD on Ethereum Network
description: BlackRock has made significant strides today by introducing BUILD, its first tokenized fund on a public blockchain(Ethereum Network). The BlackRock USD Institutional Digital Liquidity Fund, also known as BUILD or the “Fund”, allows investors to earn interest in USD, through Securituze Markets LLC. Securitize Markets LLC spearheads the tokenization of real-world assets. It provides an […]

title: Layerswap domain hijack ends, $100k stolen funds to be refunded
description: ⁤Layerswap, a platform facilitating transactions between centralized cryptocurrency exchanges and layer-2 blockchains, has regained control over its domain after it was briefly hijacked, leading to the loss of approximately $100,000 from users. ⁤ The security breach occurred on March 20…

title: Sweden’s central bank says ‘problems may arise’ in offline CBDC payments
description: In its latest report, Sweden’s Riksbank stressed the necessity for extensive technical and regulatory development to ensure secure offline payments with e-kronas. Sweden’s central bank, Riksbank, cautioned in its recent research note on CBDCs about the potential risks associated with…

title: JUP DAO: Key Steps Forward with Funding and Grants
description:

title: Coinbase’s Gamble on Futures Contracts for Altcoins Raises SEC Eyebrows
description:
A member of the crypto community pointed out that Coinbase has formally submitted a proposal to the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) regarding the introduction of futures contracts for Dogecoin, Litecoin, and Bitcoin Cash.  Directed to CFTC Secretary Christopher Kirkpatrick in a letter dated March 7, Coinbase outlined comprehensive details about these proposed contracts, including […]

The post Coinbase’s Gamble on Futures Contracts for Altcoins Raises SEC Eyebrows appeared first on Coin Edition.
